companyIntroduction:
We are a software development company based in Seoul, South Korea. LuxPM provides state-of-the-art solutions in Artificial Intelligence, Mobile App Development, Website Application Development, UI/UX Design Services, Big Data Services, and Automation. We have worked with several fortune 500 companies across the globe.

Our vision is to be the most accessible and globalized software development company in the Asia-Pacific region. We make it our goal to solve some of the most challenging problems existing in various industries at a reasonable cost and efficient timeline.

Within our industry of problem-solving, there is another type of challenge we are passionate about – globalization. Being a global company is not an easy task, yet we are striving to be a company open to people from all walks of life. We make everyone feel welcome to work with us.
jobPostingContent:
LuxPM's Footprints

LuxPM has recently launched its outposts in Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia, Singapore, and India.


We are currently building an innovative ERP platform for factory management that monitors and control real-time data for energy and resource optimization.


Who you are

Our goal with the project is to bring this to the global market with the support of our teams based in Seoul, Ho Chi Minh, Singapore, Kiev, New Delhi, Kuala Lumpur and Jakarta.


We are looking for someone who is not afraid of facing challenges, but willing to go above and beyond for solving problems.


Compensations

Competitive salary
Major Benefits

Responsibilities

Our company, LuxPM, believes in mutual growth, and that's what we value the most. The people's company. As part of the company, you will be in charge of the frontend development for our integrated sales platform.


Build features for AI IoT applications
Build the key framework for all of the microservices.
Integrate multiple microservices into the main structure.
Communicate with overseas teams that are based in Vietnam, Indonesia and Ukraine that are building other microservices.
Keep track of the progress of each and every feature and provide feedback to the overseas teams.
Perform functionality test and code review on the features

Your Expertise

At least 3 years of experience in mobile, web, or other software
At least 3 years of experience in Node JS
A major in computer science or engineering is preferred but is not a must
Excellent communication skills - Especially in English. We are a global company!
An entrepreneurial mindset. Willingness to solve challenging problems
